title: Client crash
body: Since last night my client has been crashing rather often. I am running as admin and have tried the repair feature. It has led to leaverbuster warnings for my low level account. Is anybody else having these issues?

replies.body: This issue has been fixed, I posted in other threads, sorry I missed this one. It was related to the store. You should be able to use the store without crashing now.
yea it's a shop bug. don't open the shop and it's fine.
Its not, It happened to me in champ select
happens to me if I open the shop at any point. sometimes it won't happen right away. so yea it happens in champ select too.

We have engineers looking into this now. We think it may have something to do with our maintenance performed yesterday and taking a look at the changes we made.

Thanks for posting this and I'll update when we have more info.

Dear Riot Cochese 

I can play game all this afternoon after 3-5 minute. The computer keep tell me LOlclient.exe has stopped working[Like the picture]
Please  help me tell me what should I have do for i can play .My weekend coming and I want to enjoy it with LOL .thank you

Regard 

Greenmango  SA{{champion:54}}
Don't open the shop til it is fixed.
Can I get my plat promos back? kthanks

Bit slow guys, would have thought you would have person on the boards all day.  (like any retail company in AU / NZ).
Please fix this is my only night to play.
Bloody good thing I never thought to open the store yesterday
Friday night .. dont worry no one will be playing... WTF....
shop is crashed. and lol keeps d/cing when in champ select........... plz fix
Same for me here, since the small update of Mystery Chests today.
Yep crashes every 5 min or so.
Mine crashed twice trying to look at the skin sales. Guess I am not playing LoL today.
